user_profile: User 2137 is a young adult male, intellectually inclined and open to various experiences, which is evident from his frequent visits to bookstores and coffee shops. He enjoys leisurely activities such as reading and spending time in parks, reflecting his love for tranquility and nature. Socially, he is more reserved, often found commuting through public transport like subways and trains, without excessive overtures in public settings. His agreeable nature is highlighted by his comfort in visiting public activity spots like movie theaters and nightlife venues; however, he prefers meeting friends in cozy, quieter coffee shops rather than bustling restaurants or bars. User 2137 has a structured routine, regularly stopping by convenience stores for daily necessities. As he continues to explore more, he is likely to frequent areas linked to cultural and educational events, along with maintaining key visits to coffee shops and parks. Suggested POI IDs for future visits include 3414 (Convenience Store), 3268 (Bookstore), and 4281 (Park).
